Intervention: Integer Breast Irradiation (WBI): Conventional Whole Breast Irradiation (WBI)
- Acceleration of partial breast irradiation (APBI): Acceleration of partial breast irradiation (APBI) by modulated intensity radiotherapy (IMRT)
Eligibility: Large excision or quadrantectomy with clear margins (>5 mm)
• Clips placed in a tumour bed
Forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1) <1 L/m
Results: We defined local relapse (real recurrence) as the recurrence of breast cancer in the index quadrant and ipsilateral breast tumours as any new breast cancer diagnosed in other quadrants of the same breast. The sum of local relapses and new ipsilateral breast tumours was defined as the recurrence of ipsilateral breast tumours (IBTR).
Title of the arm/group: Total breast irritation (WBI)
Description of the arm/group: conventional whole breast irradiation (WBI)
Integer Breast Irradiation (WBI): Conventional Whole Breast Irradiation (WBI)
Unit of measure: percentage of participants 1.4
Title of the arm/group: Partial breast irritation (APBI)
Description of the arm/group: accelerated partial breast irradiation (APBI)
- Acceleration of partial breast irradiation (APBI): Acceleration of partial breast irradiation (APBI) by modulated intensity radiotherapy (IMRT)
Unit of measure: percentage of participants 1.5
